text:
‼️@VP Mike Pence toured Lordstown Motors in #Ohio, a new #coronavirus hot zone where cases have soared to their highest level since April. 

NO ONE — including Pence — wore a #mask.

Total #COVIDIOTS.🤬

#COVID19

https://t.co/rfzWMH6zfO
